t: Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} God{H410} in his sanctuary{H6944}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him in the firmament{H7549} of his power{H5797}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him for his mighty acts{H1369}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him according to his excellent{H7230} greatness{H1433}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him with the sound{H8629} of the trumpet{H7782}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him with the psaltery{H5035} and harp{H3658}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him with the timbrel{H8596} and dance{H4234}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him with stringed instruments{H4482} and organs{H5748}.
Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him upon the loud{H8088} cymbals{H6767}: praise{H1984}{(H8761)} him upon the high sounding{H8643} cymbals{H6767}.
Let every thing that hath breath{H5397} praise{H1984}{(H8762)} the LORD{H3050}. Praise{H1984}{(H8761)} ye the LORD{H3050}.
